skills.title: Veil of Shadows Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between three choices at any time

children.title: Dark Thorn
children.description: 20% increased damage to nearby enemies when activating VEIL OF SHADOWS.

children.title: Night Terror
children.description: Increases the duration of Veil of Shadows by 3 seconds and increases Critical Attack Chance by 25%.

children.title: Shadow Gifts
children.description: Enemies Defeated while Veil of Shadows is active have a 35% chance to drop Heroic Orbs.

skills.title: Veil of Shadows Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time

children.title: Eclipse
children.description: Increases range of Veil of Shadows by 30%.

children.title: Visus Obscuram
children.description: Increases the duration that teammates remain invisible after being cloaked by Veil of Shadows by 5 seconds.

children.title: Mortal Cloak
children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance for teammates cloaked by Veil of Shadows by 30

skills.title: Widow's Bite Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Superstatic Dart
children.description: Increases the range of the electric field generated by Widow’s Bite by 35%

children.title: Taser Dart
children.description: Widow’s Bite projectile attaches to the target instead of exploding and deals Shock damage.

children.title: Lightning Fist
children.description: Channels Widow’s Bite energy back into the gauntlet and turns the Heroic ability into a lightning fast melee attack that sends nearby enemies flying. Increases the charge of the Assault Heroic meter.

skills.title: Widow's Bite Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Paralyzing Bite
children.description: Widow’s Bite inflicts 40% more Stun damage increasing the chance to Stun enemies

children.title: Invigorating Bite
children.description: Defeating at least one enemy with Widow’s Bite will recharge 20% of the Heroic energy for that ability

children.title: Lethal Bite
children.description: Hold an additional Widow’s Bite charge. Extra charges appear as small circles near the Assault heroic ability meter.

skills.title: Power Surge Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Galvanic Bite
children.description: Increases damage of Widow’s Bite while Power Surge is active by 20%.

children.title: Power Staff
children.description: 35% increased damage for staff attacks while Overcharged while Power Surge ability is active.

children.title: Vanquishing Surge
children.description: Defeating enemies while Power Surge is active has a 15% chance to drop Regen Packs for all team members

skills.title: Power Surge Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Kilowatt
children.description: Increases Stun damage while Power Surge is active by 30%.

children.title: Power Grid
children.description: Extends the duration of Power Surge by 4 seconds.

children.title: Indomitable Force
children.description: Increase the damage resistance to 30%, and reduce the severity of hit reactions for some enemy attacks when Power Surge is active.

skills.title: Intrinsic Charge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Intrinsic Charge
children.description: All attacks increase the charge rate of the intrinsic Shadow Ops meter by 15%

children.title: Headshot Charge
children.description: Headshot boost intrinsic Shadow Ops energy by 25 points

children.title: Takedown Charge
children.description: Takedowns boost an increased amount of intrinsic Shadow Ops energy by 20 points

skills.title: Overcharge Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Overcharge Damage
children.description: Increases all damage while Overcharged by 5%

children.title: Overcharge Ranged
children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage while Overcharged by 10%

children.title: Overcharge Critical
children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage while Overcharged by 15%

skills.title: Overcharge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Willpower Overcharge
children.description: Recover 1 point of Willpower when dealing damage when Overcharged.

children.title: Efficient Overcharge
children.description: Increases the delay by 1 second before intrinsic Shadow Ops energy begins to deplete when not attacking enemies.

children.title: Heroic Overcharge
children.description: Increases the rate at which Heroic energy recharges while Overcharged by 15%.

skills.title: Grenade Type Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hazard Grenade
children.description: All grenades leave a lingering hazard zone around their detonation location that inflict increased Status damage.

children.title: Proximity Grenade
children.description: Grenades have a delayed detonation, exploding when enemies are nearby.

children.title: Cluster Grenade
children.description: Throws a spread of three grenades that inflict damage over a wider area.

skills.title: Grenade Status Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Thermite Grenade
children.description: Adds significant Plasma damage to grenades.

children.title: Flash Freeze Grenade
children.description: Adds significant Cryo damage to grenades.

children.title: Voltaic Grenade
children.description: Adds significant Shock damage to grenades.

skills.title: Pistol Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Fast Reload
children.description: Increases reload speed by 15%

children.title: Recoil Compensator
children.description: Reduces shot recoil by 15%, allowing for a steadier aim.

children.title: Extended Magazine
children.description: Increases the magazine size of all pistol variants decreasing reload frequency.

skills.title: Stealth Attack Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Invisible Stun
children.description: Increases Stun damage while invisible 15%.

children.title: Invisible Ranged
children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage while invisible by 12%.

children.title: Invisible Status
children.description: Increases all Status damage while invisible by 20%.

skills.title: Invisibility Specializtion
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Extended Invisibility
children.description: Extends Invisibility granted from Veil of Shadows by 2 seconds.

children.title: Invisible Recharge
children.description: Heroic energy recharges 15% faster while invisible.

children.title: Invisible Willpower
children.description: Willpower regenerates at 1% per second while invisible.

skills.title: Stealth Tactics Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Critical Damage
children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage while invisible by 15%.

children.title: Critical Ranged
children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance 7% for Ranged Attacks while invisible.

children.title: Critical Melee
children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance by 20% for Melee Attacks while invisible.

skills.title: Takedown Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Takedown abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Intrinsic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns and Intrinsic Orb

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb

children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

skills.title: Ranged Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Critical Headshots
children.description: Increases Critical attack damage from headshots by 20%.

children.title: Stun Damage
children.description: Increases Stun damage by 15%

children.title: Ranged Damage
children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage by 10%

skills.title: Melee Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Combo Finishers
children.description: Increases damage from Light Combo Finishers or Heavy Combo Finishers by 25%

children.title: Critical Juggler
children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage while air juggling enemies by 15%

children.title: Melee Charge
children.description: Light and heavy Attacks boost the energy of all heroic meters by 5%

skills.title: Boneshaker Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Rampaging Boneshaker
children.description: Defeat [five] enemies while BONESHAKER is active to extend its duration by [5] seconds.

children.title: Rampaging Boneshaker
children.description: Defeat [five] enemies while BONESHAKER is active in order to restore all Willpower.

children.title: Rampaging Boneshaker
children.description: Defeat [five] enemies while BONESHAKER is active to instantly refill all intrinsic RAGE energy.

skills.title: Boneshaker Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Savage Regeneration
children.description: Defeating enemies who are [TAUNTED] by BONESHAKER causes them to drop Regen Packs.

children.title: Savage Heroism
children.description: Defeating enemies who are [TAUNTED] by BONESHAKER causes them to drop Heroic Orbs.

children.title: Savage Intimidation
children.description: Attacks from [TAUNTED] enemies have reduced impact.

skills.title: Stranglehold Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Heroic Destruction
children.description: [50%] chance defeating an enemy will generate a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Devastating Charge
children.description: Deal [200%] more [stun] damage at the end of the STRANGLEHOLD Heroic ability.

children.title: Irradiant Destruction
children.description: On the final slam, the impact causes a massive radial hazard of material of irradiated [Gamma] particles. As long as enemies are inside of the hazardous area, they will take a small amount of additional damage, as well as [Gamma] damage.

skills.title: Stranglehold Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Destructive Health
children.description: [50%] chance defeating an enemy will generate a Regen Pack.

children.title: Barbaric Charge
children.description: STRANGLEHOLD [taunts] nearby enemies and instantly Overcharges the intrinsic RAGE ability.

children.title: Barbaric Charge
children.description: Grants an additional charge of the STRANGLEHOLD Heroic ability.

skills.title: Thunderclap Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Epicenter
children.description: The distance of the THUNDERCLAP shockwave is increased by [30%].

children.title: Ground Zero
children.description: THUNDERCLAP creates a brief vacuum that draws in nearby enemies before launching them upwards with the attack. The attack creates a [Gamma] radiation zone that inflicts [Gamma] damage to affected enemies but regenerates [2%] Willpower every second for teammates within the area.

children.title: Fault Line
children.description: Focus the THUNDERCLAP shockwave into a narrower area of effect but increases both damage and [Stun] damage by [25%], demolishing enemies caught in the blast.

skills.title: Thunderclap Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose [one of three] specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between [three choices] at any time.

children.title: Thunderclap Regeneration
children.description: There is a [50%] chance defeating enemies with THUNDERCLAP will cause them to drop Regen Packs.

children.title: Thunderclap Heroic Recovery
children.description: There is a [50%] chance defeating enemies with THUNDERCLAP will cause them to drop Heroic Orbs.

children.title: Thunderclap Taunt
children.description: Enemies who survive THUNDERCLAP become [TAUNTED].

skills.title: Grab Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Vice Grip
children.description: Attacks with held enemies are now protected from interruption from enemy attacks. However, the damage will still be applied.

children.title: Durable Bludgeon
children.description: Held enemies take 30% less damage on hit with Light Grab Combos.

children.title: Combatant Shield
children.description: Hold R2 while holding a grabbed enemy to absorb incoming damage. Forces dropping of enemies when successful.

skills.title: Grab Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hard Swings
children.description: Increases damage and impact of held enemies by 20%.

children.title: Enhanced Grab
children.description: 15% improved chance grab attempts will succeed against evasive enemies.

children.title: Regen Slams
children.description: Slamming held enemies with Heavy Attacks has a 15% chance to generate Regen Packs.

skills.title: Takedown Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Willpower Recovery
children.description: Recovers 35 points of Willpower after performing a Takedown.

skills.title: Projectile Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Rubble
children.description: Thrown debris of any size explodes on impact, inflicting normal and Stun damage over a wide area.

children.title: Bedrock
children.description: Increases damage from thrown small debris by 15% and allows small debris chunks to pin enemies hit by the attack.

children.title: Wrecking Ball
children.description: Large debris does not break apart when thrown, instead rolling on the ground inflicting damage to every enemy hit by the attack. Multiple combatants can be pinned by the projectile when thrown.

skills.title: Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Ranged Damage
children.description: Increases Ranged Attack damage by 15%.

children.title: Fastball
children.description: Thrown enemies travel faster and inflict 15% more damage against combatants they hit.

children.title: Meteor Damage
children.description: Increases damage by 15% when using large debris as a thrown projectile.

skills.title: Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hand Cannon
children.description: Increases Light and Heavy Attack damage by 33.3% when using small debris as a melee weapon.

children.title: Excavator
children.description: Increases speed of picking up both large and small debris chunks by 15%.

children.title: Meteoric
children.description: Increases the durability and damage of large debris chunks by 33.3% when using the melee Light and Heavy Attack.

skills.title: Defense Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Raging Heroics
children.description: Increases charge rate of all Heroic meters by 15% while RAGE is active.

children.title: Raging Recovery
children.description: Recovers Willpower by 10% while RAGE is active and while dealing damage.

children.title: Raging Defense
children.description: Increases defensive strength by 15% while RAGE is active.

skills.title: Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Enhanced Damage
children.description: Increases all damage by 15% while RAGE is active.

children.title: Enhanced Combo Finishers
children.description: Increases damage of Light and Heavy Combo Finishers by 25% while RAGE is active.

children.title: Enhanced Bludgeon
children.description: Increases damage by 15% when using held enemies as a melee weapon while RAGE is active.

skills.title: Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Berserker Rage
children.description: Increases the intrinsic energy gained by 15% when defeating combatants with held enemies.

children.title: Controlled Rage
children.description: Reduces the initial cost of triggering RAGE by 15%.

children.title: Maximum Rage
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic RAGE energy by 15%.

skills.title: Overcharge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Impact Boost
children.description: Increases impact while Overcharged by 25% decreasing the chance enemies will be able to interrupt attacks.

children.title: Chance Boost
children.description: Increases Critical Attack Chance by 15% while Overcharged.

children.title: Defense Boost
children.description: Increases Defensive Strength by 15% while Overcharged.

skills.title: Damage Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Damage Boost
children.description: Increases all damage by 20% while Overcharged.

children.title: Stun Boost
children.description: Increases Stun damage while Overcharged by 30%, accelerating the rate at which enemy Stun meters fill.

children.title: Status Boost
children.description: Increases Status damage while Overcharged by 30%, accelerating the rate at which all Status meters fill.

skills.title: Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hot Head
children.description: Increases the amount of Overcharged intrinsic RAGE meter energy gained for all attacks by 20%.

children.title: Pancake
children.description: Increases Overcharge energy gained from Takedowns by 50%.

children.title: Temper
children.description: Reduces the rate at which Overcharged energy drains allowing you to stay Overcharged longer.

skills.title: Rally Cry Specialization I
skills.description: Customize RALLY CRY's capabilities by selecting one of three Specialization upgrades.

children.title: Field Commander
children.description: Increases the duration of RALLY CRY by 5 seconds.

children.title: Point Man
children.description: Activating RALLY CRY significantly reduces all incoming damages and TAUNTS all enemies within proximity, drawing aggro away from any nearby teammates.

children.title: Call To Arms
children.description: Triggering RALLY CRY grants a Defensive Buff that reduces damage by 25% for all nearby strike team members.

skills.title: Rally Cry Specialization II
skills.description: Customize RALLY CRY's capabilities by selecting one of three Specialization upgrades.

children.title: Hold The Line
children.description: Defeated enemies marked by RALLY CRY have a 35% chance to drop a Regen Pack.

children.title: Special Tactics
children.description: Defeated enemies marked by RALLY CRY have a 50% chance to drop an Intrinsic Orb.

children.title: Threat Control
children.description: Critical Attacks on enemies marked by RALLY CRY deal 15% bonus Stun damage.

skills.title: Steamroller Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic Abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Secret Weapon
children.description: Hold up to two charges of the STEAMROLLER Heroic ability.

children.title: Tide Breaker
children.description: Press R2 as the shield returns from a STEAMROLLER attack to kick the shield back out, dealing additional Heroic Attack Damage.

children.title: Concussive Strike
children.description: Increases Stun damage dealt by STEAMROLLER by 25%.

skills.title: Steamroller Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic Abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Second Wind
children.description: Every two enemies defeated with STEAMROLLER generates a Regen Pack.

children.title: Vanguard Charge
children.description: Every two enemies defeated with STEAMROLLER generates a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Everyday Hero
children.description: Every two enemies defeated with STEAMROLLER generates an Intrinsic Orb.

skills.title: Brooklyn Brawler Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: CQC Specialist
children.description: While BROOKLYN BRAWLER is active, Takedowns can be performed on critically wounded enemies.

children.title: Critical Acclaim
children.description: While BROOKLYN BRAWLER is active, Light Combo Finishers have increased impact and deal guaranteed Critical Attack Damage.

children.title: Strong Arm
children.description: While BROOKLYN BRAWLER is active, Ranged Attack damage and impact are increased by 25%.

skills.title: Brooklyn Brawler Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Adrenaline Rush
children.description: Takedowns extend the duration of BROOKLYN BRAWLER by 3 seconds.

children.title: Unwavering Defense
children.description: While BROOKLYN BRAWLER is active, Blocking will stop any attack.

children.title: Unfair Advantage
children.description: Grants 25% more energy to BROOKLYN BRAWLER when collecting Heroic Orbs.

skills.title: Combat Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Combo Finisher Mastery
children.description: Increases the damage by 25% of both Light and Heavy Combo Finishers.

children.title: Stun Mastery
children.description: Increases the Stun damage of all attacks by 15%.

children.title: Ranged Damage Mastery
children.description: Increases all Ranged Attack damage by 15%.

skills.title: Melee Expertise
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Air Juggling Mastery
children.description: Increases the Critical Attack damage by 15% when air juggling enemies. (Reminder: air juggling enemies has an innate Critical Attack Chance bonus.)

children.title: Combo Finisher Critical Mastery
children.description: Increases the Critical Attack damage by 15% of both Light and Heavy Combo Finishers.

children.title: Heroic Boost Combat Mastery
children.description: Boosts heroic charge speed by 1% when dealing damage with either Light or Heavy attacks.

skills.title: Takedown Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Takedown abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Takedown Recovery
children.description: Increases the amount of Willpower recovered from performing a Takedown by 15 points.

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Takedown Support
children.description: Generates a Regen Pack when performing a Takedown.

skills.title: Throw Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Perfect Catch
children.description: Press R2 when catching the shield to boosts the damage by 15% and Critical Attack Chance by 35% of the next throw.

children.title: Power Throw Damage Mastery
children.description: Increases damage by 15% against each target that is hit by a Ranged Power Attack.

children.title: Power Throw Stun Mastery
children.description: Increases the stun damage of Ranged Power Attacks by 15%.

skills.title: Shield Throwing Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Combo Finisher Kick Back
children.description: Quickly press R2 after the Ranged Combo Finisher shield throw to perform a follow-up attack.

children.title: Combo Finisher Pin
children.description: The Ranged Combo Finisher shield throw can pin enemies, dragging them into the air or into walls.

children.title: Enhanced Throw
children.description: Increases the speed and damage of all shield throws by 15%.

skills.title: Throw Utility
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Precision Regen Dynamo
children.description: 10% chance to generate a Regen Pack when defeating enemies with headshots.

children.title: Precision Heroic Dynamo
children.description: 15% chance to generate a Heroic Orb when defeating enemies with headshots.

children.title: Precision Intrinsic Dynamo
children.description: 25% chance to generate an Intrinsic Orb when defeating enemies with headshots.

skills.title: Block Energy Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Energy Boost
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy by 15%.

children.title: Energy Regeneration I
children.description: Increases the base regeneration speed of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy by 15%.

children.title: Takedown Energy Burst
children.description: Recovers 40% intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy when performing a Takedown.

skills.title: Block Energy Efficiency
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Energy Boost II
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy by 15%.

children.title: Energy Regeneration II
children.description: Increases the base regeneration speed of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy by 15%.

children.title: Energy Recharge Quick Start
children.description: Reduces the penalty by 2.5 seconds before energy regeneration begins when intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy is depleted.

skills.title: Block Energy Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Energy Boost III
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy by 15%.

children.title: Block Reaction Efficiency
children.description: Reduces the amount of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy expended when blocking an attack by 25%.

children.title: Perfect Block Energy
children.description: Grants a burst of 20 points of intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy when performing a Parry.

skills.title: Heavy Defensive Attack Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Defense Attack Efficiency I
children.description: Reduces the cost of INTRINSIC ATTACKS by 15%

children.title: Captain's Defense Parry Boost
children.description: Increases the timing window to Parry incoming attacks by 20% when the Captain's Defense buff is active. Buff is triggered by the COMMANDER'S CALL ability.

children.title: Captain's Defense Mastery
children.description: Increases the duration of the Captain's Defense buff by 8 seconds. Buff is triggered by the COMMANDER'S CALL ability.

skills.title: Light Defensive Attack Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Defense Attack Efficiency II
children.description: Further reduces the cost of INTRINSIC ATTACKS by 15%.

children.title: Intrinsic Rejuvenation
children.description: Defeating two enemies with COMMANDER'S PARRY refreshes all intrinsic SHIELD BLOCK energy.

children.title: Captain's Charge Mastery
children.description: The Captain's Charge buff now lasts for two attacks or multiple Ranged Attack throws. Buff is triggered by the COMMANDER'S PARRY ability.

skills.title: Defensive Attack Expertise
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Commander's Strength
children.description: While the Captain's Charge buff is active, melee and ranged attacks will break enemy block. Buff is triggered by the COMMANDER'S PARRY ability.

children.title: Iron Defense
children.description: While the Captain's Charge buff is active, Blocking attacks drains no intrinsic energy. Buff is triggered by the COMMANDER'S CALL ability.

children.title: Captain's Intimidation
children.description: Increases the duration of TAUNT caused by COMMANDER'S CALL by 5 seconds.

skills.title: Arc Overload Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, chose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: EMP
children.description: Using ARC OVERLOAD triggers an electromagnetic pulse which deals considerable Stun damage to all nearby enemies.

children.title: Arc Field
children.description: ARC OVERLOAD generates a one-dimensional protective bubble that blocks incoming projectiles but allows Ranged Attacks from inside the bubble to pass through, damaging enemies outside the ARC FIELD.

children.title: Arc Supercharge
children.description: Increases the duration of Overcharge state by 3 seconds when activated by ARC OVERLOAD.

skills.title: Arc Overload Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: EMP Amplifier
children.description: Increases the range and intensity of the electromagnetic pulse shockwave by 30%. Requires use of EMP ability.

children.title: Defensive Field
children.description: ARC FIELD frequency modifications reflect projectiles back at the enemy who launched them. Requires use of ARC FIELD ability.

children.title: Arc Jolt
children.description: The energy burst released by ARC OVERLOAD instantly revives nearby teammates.

skills.title: Unibeam Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Precision Refractor
children.description: Increases the maximum UNIBEAM duration by 3 seconds, allowing for greater damage output.

children.title: Reserve Capacitors
children.description: Additional energy capacitors allow storage of up to three charges of the UNIBEAM heroic ability but shorten the fire time to a quick burst.

children.title: Omega Beam
children.description: A concentrated beam that combines both Repulsor and UNIBEAM firepower into a single, massive energy blast that deals a large amount of damage to everything in its path.

skills.title: Unibeam Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Concentrated Fire
children.description:
Unibeam deals more damage to a target the longer the blast is maintained on a single enemy.
When using the RESERVE CAPACITORS skill, each additional shot against the same target will deal 30% more damage.

children.title: Triple Down
children.description: Rapidly defeating three enemies with UNIBEAM will Overcharge the intrinsic SUPERCHARGE ability.

children.title: Energy Condenser
children.description: Enemies defeated by UNIBEAM will drop Heroic Orbs.

skills.title: Hulkbuster Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hulkbuster Unibeam
children.description: When using HULKBUSTER, press R1 to unleash a torrential beam of energy drawn directly from the central R.T. node.

children.title: Disruption Pulse
children.description: When using HULKBUSTER, press R2 to emit a variable wavelength EM pulse that immobilizes all enemies within its radius.

children.title: Magno-Missile Barrage
children.description: Magno-missiles can target up to eight enemies. Requires MAGNO-MISSILE ability.

skills.title: Hulkbuster Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Hyper Coils
children.description: Arc reactor improvements allow the HULKBUSTER to be deployed for 5 more seconds.

children.title: Energy Star
children.description: Reduces the intrinsic energy cost by 25% for actions or attacks while using the HULKBUSTER.

children.title: Titanium Bravado
children.description: HULKBUSTER melee attacks have a 50% chance to TAUNT nearby enemies, drawing their attention.

skills.title: Melee Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between three choices at any time.

children.title: Stun Mastery
children.description: Increases all Stun damage dealt to enemies by 15%.

children.title: Air Combat Mastery
children.description: Boosts Critical Attack damage done while air juggling opponents by 15%.

children.title: Combo Finisher Mastery
children.description: Increases the damage of all Combo Finishers by 25%.

skills.title: Takedown Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Takedown abilities. Swap between three choices at any time.

children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Intrinsic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb.

skills.title: Ranged Attack Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between three choices at any time.

children.title: Ranged Combat Mastery
children.description: Increases all Ranged Attack damage by 15%.

children.title: Critical Expertise
children.description: Increases Critical Damage by 15% for all Ranged Attacks.

children.title: Weapon Efficiency Mastery
children.description: 15% reduction to intrinsic energy meter cost for all Ranged Attacks and Weapons.

skills.title: Ranged Weapon Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Repulsor Mastery
children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage for Repulsor Attacks by 15%.

children.title: Laser Mastery
children.description: Increases Stun damage for all Laser attacks by 20%.

children.title: Rocket Mastery
children.description: Increases damage for all Rocket attacks by 12%.

skills.title: Ranged Weapon Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Repulsor Specialization
children.description: Increases the rate of fire for aimed Repulsor attacks by 10%.

children.title: Laser Specialization
children.description: Reduces the intrinsic energy cost of using aimed fire for the Laser weapon by 10%

children.title: Rocket Specialization
children.description: Adds target guidance system to basic aimed Rocket attacks.

skills.title: Ranged Weapon Efficiency
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Repulsor Efficiency
children.description: Decreases intrinsic energy cost for Repulsor attacks by 10%.

children.title: Laser Efficiency
children.description: Decreases intrinsic energy cost for Laser attacks by 10%.

children.title: Rocket Efficiency
children.description: Decreases intrinsic energy cost for Rocket attacks by 10%.

skills.title: Arc Reactor Efficiency
skills.description: Once unlocked, chose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Arc Reactor Capacity
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic SUPERCHARGE energy by 15%.

children.title: Arc Reactor Generator
children.description: Increases the base regeneration speed of intrinsic energy by 10%

children.title: Arc Reactor Kinetic Atomizer
children.description: Increases the intrinsic energy gained from dealing damage with Light Attacks by 16% per hit.

skills.title: Arc Reactor Advancement
skills.description: Once unlocked, chose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Perfect Evade Intrinsic Boost
children.description: Instantly generate 15 points of intrinsic energy when performing a Perfect Evade

children.title: Stun Intrinsic Boost
children.description: STUNNING an enemy instantly boosts intrinsic energy by 25 points.

children.title: Overcharged Duration Boost
children.description: Increases the duration of the OVERCHARGED state by 2 seconds.

skills.title: Arc Reactor Overclock
skills.description: Once unlocked, chose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Overcharge Damage Boost
children.description: Increases damage for all attacks while Overcharged by 12.5%

children.title: Overcharge Defense Boost
children.description: 20% reduction in damage for all attacks while Overcharged.

children.title: Overcharge Heroic Boost
children.description: Increases the charge rate of all Heroic meters while Overcharged by 10%.

skills.title: Arc Defense Advancement
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive Abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Energy Sheield Efficiency
children.description: Reduces the cost of the ENERGY SHIELD activation by 15%

children.title: Reactive Generator
children.description:
Grants 15 intrinsic energy points when parrying enemy attacks with the ENERGY PULSE ability.
Requires the ENERGY PULSE skill.

children.title: Energized Pulse
children.description:
Adds Shock damage to the ENERGY PULSE ability.
Requires the ENERGY PULSE skill.

skills.title: Energy Barrier Advancement
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive Abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Empowering Barrier
children.description:
Regenerates 5% per second of intrinsic energy of Heroes near the ENERGY BARRIER.
Requires the ENERGY BARRIER skill.
Requires the ENERGY BARRIER skill.

children.title: Reflective Barrier
children.description:
The ENERGY BARRIER will reflect projectiles back at the attacker.
Requires the ENERGY BARRIER skill.
Requires the ENERGY BARRIER skill.

children.title: Tactical Barrier
children.description:
Heroes near the ENERGY BARRIER gain a 15% Critical Chance increase on all attacks..
Requires the ENERGY BARRIER skill.
Requires the ENERGY BARRIER skill.

skills.title: Flight Mastery
skills.description: Once unlocked, chose one of three specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Afterburner
children.description: Hold X while flying to increase speed at the cost of intrinsic energy.

children.title: Countermeasures
children.description:
Double Tap O while flying to fire off flares that draw in tracking projectiles and detonate other projectiles safely.
10 second cooldown.

children.title: Air Superiority
children.description: Increases the damage of Ranged Attacks while flying by 15%.

skills.title: Healing Spirit Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Will to Live
children.description: Grants an additional charge of HEALING SPIRIT.

children.title: Life Spark
children.description: HEALING SPIRIT can be activated while downed, bypassing the need to be revived by a teammate.

children.title: Boundless Inspiration
children.description: Teammate Willpower is fully restored when activating HEALING SPIRIT.

skills.title: Healing Spirit Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Will to Fight
children.description: Grants an additional charge of HEALING SPIRIT.

children.title: Focused Heart
children.description: Activating HEALING SPIRIT automatically grants 100% intrinsic energy for allies and yourself.

children.title: Inner Peace
children.description: Increases the duration of HEALING SPIRIT's residual effect by 8 seconds.

skills.title: High Five Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Up High
children.description: Increases damage against a single, focused target by 25%

children.title: Down Low
children.description: Can pin enemies with a single activation.

children.title: Too Slow
children.description: Adds a large explosion area on impact.

skills.title: High Five Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Helping Hand
children.description:
Based on chosen HIGH FIVE specialization, defeating enemies with HIGH FIVE has a chance to create Regen Packs.
HIGH FIVE: 33%
UP HIGH: 50%[n] DOWN LOW: 33%[n] TOO SLOW: 20%

children.title: Patty Cake
children.description:
Based on chosen HIGH FIVE specialization, defeating enemies with HIGH FIVE has a chance to create Heroic Orbs.
HIGH FIVE: 40%
UP HIGH: 60%
DOWN LOW: 40%
TOO SLOW: 25%

children.title: Applause
children.description:
Based on chosen HIGH FIVE specialization, defeating enemies with HIGH FIVE has a chance to create Intrinsic Orbs.
HIGH FIVE: 60%
UP HIGH: 90%
DOWN LOW: 60.0%
TOO SLOW: 37.5%

skills.title: Embiggen Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Big Trouble
children.description: Extends the duration of the EMBIGGEN ability by 5 seconds.

children.title: Obvious Distraction
children.description: Activating EMBIGGEN TAUNTS all nearby enemies, drawing aggro and focusing their attention away from any other teammates.

children.title: Doctor's Orders
children.description: Every enemy defeated while EMBIGGENED has a 25% chance to drop a Regen Pack.

skills.title: Embiggen Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Fists of Fury
children.description: Defeating enemies while EMBIGGENED extends the duration of the ability by 1 second.

children.title: Fists of Fate
children.description: Critical Attack does 35% more damage while EMBIGGENED.

children.title: Fists of Glory
children.description: Every enemy defeated while EMBIGGENED has a 25% chance to drop Heroic Orbs.

skills.title: Melee Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Combo Finisher Mastery
children.description: Increases the damage of all Combo Finishers by 25%.

children.title: Ranged Combat Mastery
children.description: Boosts all Ranged Attack damage by 15%.

children.title: Stun Mastery
children.description: Increases all Stun damage by 15%.

skills.title: Melee Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Air Combat Mastery
children.description: Boosts Critical Attack damage by 15% while air juggling opponents.

children.title: Traversal Attack Mastery
children.description: Boosts Critical Attack damage of Traversal attacks by 15%.

children.title: Heroic Energy Mastery
children.description: Increases the amount of Heroic energy gained by 1% from dealing damage with Light and Heavy Attacks.

skills.title: Takedown Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Takedown abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Intrinsic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns an Intrinsic Orb.

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns an Heroic Orb.

children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

skills.title: Ranged Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Ranged Power Punch
children.description: Increases the power and weight of WHIP FIST, causing a stronger enemy reaction.

children.title: Ranged Concussive Mastery
children.description: WHIP FIST creates a concussive blast on impact location.

children.title: Ranged Pierce
children.description: WHIP FIST pierces through enemies, hitting anything in its path.

skills.title: Ranged Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Grab Efficiency
children.description: Reduces the cost of holding onto an enemy by 40%.

children.title: Grab Protection
children.description: Prevents being interrupted from enemy attacks while holding onto an enemy.

children.title: Grab Accuracy
children.description: Reduces chance enemies evade Grab by 15%.

skills.title: Ranged Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Regen Pack Grab Mastery
children.description: 15% chance to upgrade a Regen Pack after slamming or throwing a grabbed enemy.

children.title: Heroic Grab Mastery
children.description: 25% chance to generate a Heroic Orb after slamming or throwing a grabbed enemy.

children.title: Intrinsic Grab Mastery
children.description: 40% chance to generate an Intrinsic Orb when slamming or throwing a grabbed enemy.

skills.title: Intrinsic Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Polymorph Efficiency
children.description:
Reduces the intrinsic energy activation cost by 40% when triggering the POLYMORPH ability.
Does not apply to sustained energy drain.

children.title: Polymorphic Regeneration
children.description: Increases Willpower regeneration from SHINING WILL by 25%.

children.title: Heroic Polymorphy
children.description: Increase Heroic energy regeneration by 15% while using POLYMORPH.

skills.title: Intrinsic Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Polymorphic Reduction
children.description:
Reduces the sustained intrinsic energy cost by 25% while using the POLYMORPH ability.
Does not apply to the activation cost.

children.title: Polymorph Damage
children.description: Increases the damage of all melee attacks by 12.5% while using POLYMORPH.

children.title: Polymorphic Defense
children.description: Reduces the damage received by 15% while using POLYMORPH.

skills.title: Intrinsic Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Polymorph Boost
children.description: Increases maximum amount of POLYMORPH intrinsic meter by 20%.

children.title: Polymorph Intensity
children.description: Increases the amount of Stun damage while POLYMORPH is active by 30%.

children.title: Polymorph Precision
children.description: Increased chance to land a Critical Hit while POLYMORPH is active by 15%.

skills.title: Intrinsic Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Super Hero Endurance
children.description:
Reduces the intrinsic energy cost for POLYMORPH attacks by 25%.
Applies to the following abilities:
WHIRLWIND
SEISMIC SLAM

children.title: Polymorphic Might
children.description:
Increases the Stun damage dealt by POLYMORPH attacks by 25%.
Applies to the following abilities:
MORNING STAR
PALM STRIKE
WHIRLWIND
SEISMIC SLAM

children.title: Cunning Resolve
children.description:
Increases the Critical Attack Chance for POLYMORPH attacks by 15%.
Applies to the following abilities:
MORNING STAR
PALM STRIKE
WHIRLWIND
SEISMIC SLAM

skills.title: Intrinsic Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Evasive Energy
children.description: Perfect Evade refunds 30 points of intrinsic energy.

children.title: Recovering Rebound
children.description: Parrying an attack with HIP CHECK restores 20 points of intrinsic energy.

children.title: Adrenaline Surge
children.description: Intrinsic energy recharges faster the lower the current amount of Willpower, up to a maximum of 30% bonus.

skills.title: Defense Upgrade
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three specialization options to modify Defensive abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Sixth Sense
children.description: Increases the size of the Parry window of the HIP CHECK ability by 20%.

children.title: Rapid Regeneration
children.description: SHINING WILL increases the recovery rate of WIllpower the lower the amount becomes up to 15%.

children.title: Nimble Reflexes
children.description: Temporarily inhibits draining of intrinsic energy for 1.5 seconds after successfully Countering or Parrying attacks.

skills.title: Warrior's Fury Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Ymir's Wrath
children.description: Nearby teammates receive a temporary damage boost of 25% when WARRIOR'S FURY is activated.

children.title: Hel's Discretion
children.description: Nearby downed teammates will be revived when WARRIOR'S FURY is activated.

children.title: Ygdrasill's Blessing
children.description: Nearby teammates recover 10% Willpower every 3 seconds while ability is active

skills.title: Warrior's Fury Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Asgard's Fortune
children.description: Enemies defeated while WARRIOR'S FURY is active have a 50% chance to drop a Heroic Orb.

children.title: Hel's Anger
children.description: Increase Critical Attack Damage by 25.0% and Critical Attack Chance by 10% of anyone affected by WARRIOR'S FURY.

children.title: Yggdrasil's Favor
children.description: Nearby teammates receive an intermittent intrinsic energy boost of 20% while WARRIOR'S FURY is active.

skills.title: God Blast Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Thunderstorm
children.description: Hold up to three charges of the GOD BLAST ability. The ability charges faster than normal but enemies are not lifted into the air when GOD BLAST is activated.

children.title: Son Of The Elder Gods
children.description: GOD BLAST whirlwind inflicts 20% more damage and applies Cryo damage to targets caught in the swirling vortexes.

children.title: Legend Of Asgard
children.description: Enemies caught in the GOD BLAST whirlwind have a 33% chance to drop Regen Packs.

skills.title: God Blast Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Overexposure
children.description: GOD BLAST inflicts 15% increased normal and Stun damage against SHOCKED enemies.

children.title: Overcharge Blast
children.description:
GOD BLAST inflicts 20% increased damage when triggered while Overcharged.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

children.title: Rolling Thunder
children.description: Defeating enemies with GOD BLAST refunds 5% of Assault Heroic energy.

skills.title: Bifrost Specialization I
skills.description: Customize BIFROST's capabilities by selecting one of three Specialization upgrades. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Jotunheim's Tempest
children.description: BIFROST channels the heart of Jotunheim on impact, creating an icy explosion that deals a massive amount of Cryo Status damage, slowing any enemies affected by the Status Effect.

children.title: Muspelheim's Torment
children.description: BIFROST leaves a massive, circular hazardous zone of burning embers at its impact point, dealing additional damage, as well as Burn damage to all enemies inside the radius.

children.title: Alfheim's Favor
children.description: BIFROST creates a spherical aura of healing around its impact point that restores 10% of Willpower per second to all team members within the area.

skills.title: Bifrost Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Heroic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Invigorating Bifrost
children.description: Heroic Orbs restore an additional 5% of Ultimate Heroic energy when picked up.

children.title: Asgard's Light
children.description: Automatically recovers 50% of your maximum Willpower when returning from the BIFROST.

children.title: Odin's Blessing Of The Realm
children.description:
Automatically activate ODINFORCE Overcharge when returning from the BIFROST.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

skills.title: Damage Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Melee Stun Damage
children.description: Increases melee Stun damage by 15%.

children.title: Ranged Damage
children.description: Increases all Ranged Attack damage by 15%.

children.title: Heroic Charge
children.description: Light and Heavy Attacks boost the energy of all Heroic ability meters by 1.5% for light attacks and 2.0% for heavy attacks.

skills.title: Damage Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Melee abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Unarmed Damage
children.description: Increases damage from Unarmed Attacks by 15%

children.title: Critical Juggler
children.description: Increases Critical Attack damage when air juggling enemies by 15%.

children.title: Combo damage
children.description: Increases damage from Combo finishers by 25%.

skills.title: Takedown Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Takedown abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Willpower Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Regen Pack.

children.title: Heroic Takedown Mastery
children.description: Performing a Takedown spawns a Heroic Orb..

children.title: Willpower Recovery
children.description: Takedowns recover a bonus 15% amount of Willpower.

skills.title: Hammer Specialization I
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Impact Explosion
children.description:
Hold R2 to charge TORNADO THROW and cause the Hammer to spawn a series of lightning explosions on impact. Disables the ability to pin combatants.
Requires the TORNADO THROW skill.

children.title: Manual Targetting
children.description: Hold R2 to manually target enemies while Aiming TORNADO THROW. Disables the ability to pin combatants.

children.title: Critical Throw
children.description: Hold R2 then release precisely when the Hammer flashes to guarantee the throw inflicts 20% increased Critical Attack damage. Requires TORNADO THROW to be unlocked.

skills.title: Hammer Specialization II
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Ranged abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Critical Return
children.description: Increases the chance the Hammer will inflict Critical Attacks on return flight by 35%.

children.title: High Velocity
children.description: Increases hammer throw and recall speed by 15%.

children.title: Guard Breaker
children.description: Ranged attacks with the hammer break through blocking enemies.

skills.title: Flight Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify Traversal abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Charged Flight
children.description: Extended Flight generates an electrical charge that is dispersed in an energy explosion on impact.

children.title: Speed Burst
children.description: Hold X while flying to quickly accelerate forward in a momentary speed burst. Drains intrinsic ODINFORCE energy when used.

children.title: Flying Shots
children.description: Press O while flying to shoot out bolts of lightning at nearby targets. Slowly drains the intrinsic ODINFORCE energy while active.

skills.title: Odinforce Attack Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Ionic Bolts
children.description: Defeating enemies while ODINFORCE is active strikes nearby targets with lightning.

children.title: Force Of Will
children.description: Dealing damage while ODINFORCE is active will recover 1.2% Willpower per hit.

children.title: Orb Dynamo
children.description: Defeating enemies while ODINFORCE is active has a 25% chance to generate Regen Packs for all team members.

skills.title: Odinforce Charge Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Maximum Force
children.description: Increases the maximum amount of intrinsic ODINFORCE energy by 15%.

children.title: Dodge Charge
children.description: Performing a Perfect Dodge grants 30 points of intrinsic ODINFORCE energy.

children.title: Takedown Charge
children.description: Takedowns grant 30 points of intrinsic ODINFORCE energy.

skills.title: Odinforce Efficiency Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Honed Force
children.description: Reduces the overall energy cost of using the intrinsic ODINFORCE ability by 10%.

children.title: Surging Force
children.description: Increases the automatic regeneration speed of intrinsic ODINFORCE energy by 12%.

children.title: Asgardian Fortitude
children.description: Reduces the intrinsic ODINFORCE energy penalty incurred when failing to Counter against strong or unblockable attacks by 50%.

skills.title: Overcharge Attack Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Power Hazard
children.description:
When Overcharged, Power Attack generate small electrical hazards.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill

children.title: Lightning Field
children.description:
When Overcharged, surrounding enemies will be intermittently struck by lightning.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

children.title: Explosive Defense
children.description:
When Overcharged, Countering enemy attacks summons an additional lightning bolt with an explosion size increased by 35%.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

skills.title: Overcharge Defense Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Charged Resistance
children.description:
Increases damage resistance by 50% when ODINFORCE is Overcharged.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

children.title: Charged Recovery
children.description:
Increases Willpower recovery by 2% when ODINFORCE is Overcharged.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

children.title: Charged Heroic
children.description:
Increases Heroic energy regeneration when ODINFORCE is Overcharged by 10%.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

skills.title: Overcharge Activation Specialization
skills.description: Once unlocked, choose one of three Specialization options to modify intrinsic Overcharge abilities. Swap between the three choices at any time.

children.title: Damage Force
children.description:
Increases all damage by 15% when ODINFORCE is Overcharged.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.

children.title: Charging Force
children.description:
When ODINFORCE meter is full, increase the amount of Overcharge energy gained on every attack by 20%.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS. skill.

children.title: Unarmed Force
children.description:
Increases the amount of Overcharge intrinsic ODINFORCE energy gained by Unarmed Attacks by 35%.
Requires the DIVINE CHAOS skill.
